mapper.select: select rownum, replyWriter, replyContent, bno, replyDate from (select * from GK_COMMENT order by replyDate desc) where rownum <= 1
select rownum, recmtWriter, recmtContent, rno, recmtDate from (select * from GK_RECOMMENT order by recmtDate desc) where rownum <= 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM gk_user_file f, gk_user u where f.uno=u.uno and #{replyWriter}=u.userId
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM gk_user_file f, gk_user u where f.uno=u.uno and #{recmtWriter}=u.userId
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GK_COMMENT where bno=#{bno}
mapper.insert: insert into GK_COMMENT(rno, bno, replyWriter ,replyContent ,replyDate) values (GK_COMMENT_SEQ.nextval, #{bno}, #{replyWriter}, #{replyContent}, sysdate)
insert into GK_RECOMMENT(cno, rno, recmtWriter ,recmtContent ,recmtDate) values (GK_recmt_SEQ.nextval, #{rno}, #{recmtWriter}, #{recmtContent}, sysdate)
